byline.contributor: Liam Stack and Vanessa Friedman contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Mr. Galanos, who outfitted Nancy Reagan for inaugural events, earned numerous accolades even as he evaded celebrity and shunned the fashion establishment.

headline.print_headline: James Galanos, Who Dressed America’s Elite, Dies at 92
headline.main: James Galanos, Fashion Designer for the Elite, Dies at 92

snippet: Mr. Galanos, who outfitted Nancy Reagan for inaugural events, earned numerous accolades even as he evaded celebrity and shunned the fashion establishment....
abstract: James Galanos, celebrated designer of haute couture and favorite clothier of former first lady Nancy Reagan, dies at age 92; Galanos catered to America's wealthy and elite over his long career, but shunned celebrity culture and even the fashion establishment itself.
